body: @narinus : The point is, Rem grows her 2nd horn after having sex with Subaru. Because of her guilt of seeing Ram without horn, she got an idea to make Subaru and Ram having sex so she could grow her horn back. After the intercourse, it failed. But don't worry! Rem comes with another idea that will come in the next volume, I guess?
i wont ask for translations but could you at least explain the plot to me?
